title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Mike Silver on Jimmy G’s Niners Ghosting, Brady to Raiders Deal
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Mike Silver on Jimmy G’s Niners Ghosting, Brady to Raiders Deal
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains why he’s not being too harsh labeling Packers backup Jordan Love a bust, and if he’s outraged over the controversial cut block of Giants DE Kayvon Thibodeaux that had Twitter in a frenzy.

Then, longtime NFL writer - and host of the Open Mike podcast - Mike Silver joins Colin to discuss his article reporting Jimmy Garoppolo’s penchant for repeatedly “ghosting” the Niners in the offseason (10:00), if the Bucs could make a move for Jimmy G (21:00), why Tom Brady didn’t end up playing for Jon Gruden’s Raiders in 2020 (24:00), and why no QB controversy will get as messy as Joe Montana and Steve Young with the early 90's Niners (32:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd   

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
